properties.description:
The playbook steps:

1.	Get Indicators - Make a generic http request to ACSC hosted IOC csv file, do some clean up and store the indicators
2.	Parse IOCs - from raw text using SecureX Threat Response Inspect API
3.	Enrich Observables - with SecureX Threat Response Enrich API to find any global sightings (in integrated threat feeds) and more importantly local sightings/targets (in integrated security modules like Umbrella, AMP, etc.)
4.	Share Targets - For each module queried, if any targets founds, post on webex teams and/or send an email.
5.	Case Management - Create a new casebook the first time any targets are found and on subsequent runs keep updating the casebook when targets found.
Delete special characters such as end of line
Save indicators to a local variable called "indicators"
Convert unformatted text from ACSC Advirosy list into formatted list of observables

Observe an Entity - return Sightings from your modules about any of the above entity types. Sighting - an observation of an observable. For example, an endpoint detecting a file hash detected on a filesystem, or on the network by a firewall.
